programme.title: The First 48 - The Standoff (#421) (Season 21, Episode 21)
programme.desc: Tulsa Homicide responds when a father of three is gunned down at his job by suspects who end up in a standoff with police.

programme.title: The First 48 - Devils Trail (Season 21, Episode 8)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, detectives have little to go on when they find the naked body of an unknown homeless woman who was raped, strangled to death, and thrown into a dumpster.

programme.title: The First 48 - Shooting Blind/Brothers in Arms (#431) (Season 21, Episode 25)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, detectives question whether a young woman's death was a tragic mistake or murder. In Mobile, the murder of a young father tests a bond between brothers.

programme.title: The First 48 - Old Flame/Bad Behavior (#435) (Season 21, Episode 28)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, when a late-night shootout leaves a young man dead, the investigation leads to a woman from his past. When a Marine veteran is shot, detectives must determine if a claim of self-defense is a cover for the truth.

programme.title: The First 48 - Escape Plan/Path of Terror (#430) (Season 21, Episode 29)
programme.desc: A mother is stabbed to death and Gwinnett detectives must find her missing son who might be the only witness. Tulsa detectives need to find out if there is a link between the murders of a pregnant woman and a young man.

programme.title: The First 48 - Cover Story (#425) (Season 21, Episode 31)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, after a man calls 911 claiming his girlfriend shot and killed herself, detectives discover evidence suggesting foul play.
